entry.source: I'm recording a TV show, and I'd like you to{F801}participate. We put the Hunters on the White{F801}Team, the demons on the Red Team, and they{F801}fight to the death. If you want to be on the{F801}White Team, meet at the {F804,5}Studio Art Building{F804,0}{F801}next to the {F804,5}Shinjuku station east gate.{F804,0}{F801}
